languages.text: {n}Сумрачно взрыкнув, Ульфар посылает вам леденящий взгляд, рождающий в сердце понимание чудовищной пропасти, разделяющей вас и древнего сверхчеловека, стоящего напротив.{/n} "Их сагу я петь тебе не готов. Ты не проливал{mf||а} с ними кровь, ты не делил{mf||а} с ними мясо и мьод. Их духи могут оскорбиться, узнав, что я пою о их деяниях чужа{mf|ку|чке}".

{n}Ulfar lets out a sullen growl and pins you with an icy glance that sparks something within you — awareness of the monstrous chasm separating you and the ancient superhuman standing opposite.{/n} "Their saga is one I will not sing to you. You have spilt no blood with them nor shared with them meat and mjod. Their spirits might be outraged if they knew I had sung of their deeds to a stranger."
languages.original_text: {n}Сумрачно взрыкнув, Ульфар посылает вам леденящий взгляд, рождающий в сердце понимание чудовищной пропасти, разделяющей вас и древнего сверхчеловека, стоящего напротив.{/n} "Их сагу я петь тебе не готов. Ты не проливал{mf||а} с ними кровь, ты не делил{mf||а} с ними мясо и мьод. Их духи могут оскорбиться, узнав, что я пою о их деяниях чужа{mf|ку|чке}".

You have spilt no blood with them nor shared with them meat and mjod. Their spirits might be outraged if they knew I had sung of their deeds to a stranger."

You have spilt no blood with them nor shared with them meat and mjod. Their spirits might be outraged if they knew I had sung of their deeds to a stranger."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法发出了愠怒的咆哮，冰冷的目光注视着你。你不禁意识到，你和你眼前这个来自原始世界的超级人类之间，隔着一道巨大的鸿沟。{/n}“我不会把他们的史诗唱给你听。你没有和他们一起流过血，也没有和他们一起吃过肉，喝过蜜酒。如果他们知道，我把他们的故事传唱给陌生人听，他们的灵魂可能会愤恨不已。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a sullen growl and pins you with an icy glance that sparks something within you — awareness of the monstrous chasm separating you and the ancient superhuman standing opposite.{/n} "Their saga is one I will not sing to you. You have spilt no blood with them nor shared with them meat and mjod. Their spirits might be outraged if they knew I had sung of their deeds to a stranger."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法发出了愠怒的咆哮，冰冷的目光注视着你。你不禁意识到，你和你眼前这个来自原始世界的超级人类之间，隔着一道巨大的鸿沟。{/n}“我不会把他们的史诗唱给你听。你没有和他们一起流过血，也没有和他们一起吃过肉，喝过蜜酒。如果他们知道，我把他们的故事传唱给陌生人听，他们的灵魂可能会愤恨不已。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar gruñe, taciturno, y te lanza una mirada helada que refleja algo con claridad meridiana: la monumental diferencia que te separa del antiguo ser sobrehumano que tienes delante.{/n} «No le cantaré su saga. No ha derramado sangre a su lado ni compartido carne y mjod con ellos. Sus espíritus estarían furiosos si supieran que había cantado sus gestas a un{mf||a} desconocid{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a sullen growl and pins you with an icy glance that sparks something within you — awareness of the monstrous chasm separating you and the ancient superhuman standing opposite.{/n} "Their saga is one I will not sing to you. You have spilt no blood with them nor shared with them meat and mjod. Their spirits might be outraged if they knew I had sung of their deeds to a stranger."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar gruñe, taciturno, y te lanza una mirada helada que refleja algo con claridad meridiana: la monumental diferencia que te separa del antiguo ser sobrehumano que tienes delante.{/n} «No le cantaré su saga. No ha derramado sangre a su lado ni compartido carne y mjod con ellos. Sus espíritus estarían furiosos si supieran que había cantado sus gestas a un{mf||a} desconocid{mf|o|a}».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーは不機嫌そうなうなり声を上げ、氷のような視線であなたを見つめる…向かいあう古代の超人と、己を隔てる巨大な溝を否応なく意識させられる{/n}「彼らのサーガは、俺がお前に歌うものではない。お前は彼らと血を流したこともなければ、肉やミョードを分かち合ったこともない。もし俺が彼らの行いを赤の他人に歌ったと知ったら、彼らの霊は怒り狂うかもしれない」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a sullen growl and pins you with an icy glance that sparks something within you — awareness of the monstrous chasm separating you and the ancient superhuman standing opposite.{/n} "Their saga is one I will not sing to you. You have spilt no blood with them nor shared with them meat and mjod. Their spirits might be outraged if they knew I had sung of their deeds to a stranger."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーは不機嫌そうなうなり声を上げ、氷のような視線であなたを見つめる…向かいあう古代の超人と、己を隔てる巨大な溝を否応なく意識させられる{/n}「彼らのサーガは、俺がお前に歌うものではない。お前は彼らと血を流したこともなければ、肉やミードを分かち合ったこともない。もし俺が彼らの行いを赤の他人に歌ったと知ったら、彼らの霊は怒り狂うかもしれない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar stößt ein beleidigtes Knurren aus und fixiert dich mit einem eisigen Blick, der etwas in dir weckt — ein Bewusstsein des gewaltigen Abgrunds zwischen dir und dem uralten Übermenschen, der dir gegenübersteht.{/n} "Ihre Saga ist eine, die ich Euch nicht vorsingen werde. Ihr habt kein Blut mit ihnen vergossen, kein Fleisch und keinen Mjod mit ihnen geteilt. Ihre Geister wären erzürnt, wenn sie wüssten, dass ich {mf|einem|einer} Fremden von seinen Taten vorgesungen habe."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a sullen growl and pins you with an icy glance that sparks something within you — awareness of the monstrous chasm separating you and the ancient superhuman standing opposite.{/n} "Their saga is one I will not sing to you. You have spilt no blood with them nor shared with them meat and mjod. Their spirits might be outraged if they knew I had sung of their deeds to a stranger."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar stößt ein beleidigtes Knurren aus und fixiert dich mit einem eisigen Blick, der etwas in dir weckt — ein Bewusstsein des gewaltigen Abgrunds zwischen dir und dem uralten Übermenschen, der dir gegenübersteht.{/n} "Ihre Saga ist eine, die ich Euch nicht vorsingen werde. Ihr habt kein Blut mit ihnen vergossen, kein Fleisch und keinen Mjod mit ihnen geteilt. Ihre Geister wären erzürnt, wenn sie wüssten, dass ich {mf|einem|einer} Fremden von seinen Taten vorgesungen habe."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar émet un grognement maussade et vous fixe d'un regard glacé qui éveille quelque chose en vous : la soudaine prise de conscience du gigantesque fossé qui vous sépare du surhomme qui se tient devant vous.{/n} « Je ne vais pas vous chanter leur saga. Vous n'avez pas versé le sang à leurs côtés ni partagé de viande ou de mjod avec eux. Leurs esprits seraient révoltés de savoir que j'ai chanté leurs exploits à {mf|un étranger|une étrangère}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a sullen growl and pins you with an icy glance that sparks something within you — awareness of the monstrous chasm separating you and the ancient superhuman standing opposite.{/n} "Their saga is one I will not sing to you. You have spilt no blood with them nor shared with them meat and mjod. Their spirits might be outraged if they knew I had sung of their deeds to a stranger."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar émet un grognement maussade et vous fixe d'un regard glacé qui éveille quelque chose en vous : la soudaine prise de conscience du gigantesque fossé qui vous sépare du surhomme qui se tient devant vous.{/n} « Je ne vais pas vous chanter leur saga. Vous n'avez pas versé le sang à leurs côtés ni partagé de viande ou de mjod avec eux. Leurs esprits seraient révoltés de savoir que j'ai chanté leurs exploits à {mf|un étranger|une étrangère}. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a sullen growl and pins you with an icy glance that sparks something within you — awareness of the monstrous chasm separating you and the ancient superhuman standing opposite.{/n} "Their saga is one I will not sing to you. You have spilt no blood with them nor shared with them meat and mjod. Their spirits might be outraged if they knew I had sung of their deeds to a stranger."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, kasvetle uluyup içinde bir his uyandıran, soğuk bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor. Kendinle karşında duran insan üstü varlığı ayıran devasa yarığın farkına varıyorsun.{/n} "Onların destanını sana okuyamam. Onlarla kan dökmedin, onlarla aynı sofrada et yiyip mjod içmedin. Ruhları, yaptıklarını bir yabancıya anlattığımı öğrenirse çok sinirlenir."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar lets out a sullen growl and pins you with an icy glance that sparks something within you — awareness of the monstrous chasm separating you and the ancient superhuman standing opposite.{/n} "Their saga is one I will not sing to you. You have spilt no blood with them nor shared with them meat and mjod. Their spirits might be outraged if they knew I had sung of their deeds to a stranger."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar kasvetle uluyor ve içinde bir his uyandıran, soğuk bir ifadeyle sana bakıyor. Kendinle karşında duran insan üstü varlığı ayıran devasa yarığın farkına varıyorsun.{/n} "Onların destanını sana okuyamam. Onlarla kan dökmedin, onlarla aynı sofrada et yiyip mjod içmedin. Yaptıklarını bir yabancıya anlattığımı öğrenen ruhları çok sinirlenir."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
